pageContext.claim: “Robert O'Brien. Robert, how many -- how many hostages have you and I negotiated to get back not giving anything, but we have a record of what, Robert? 50? 50, you know.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence to support Trump's claim of a record. The 52 Iranian hostages were released on the first day of Ronald Reagan's term. Moreover, a former Obama administration official said 100 hostages were released just in 2015 and 2016. Many hostage releases are classified, making it difficult to have a complete accounting.
